txt.en: Using the ingredients you have, craft a <rgb=#FF00FF00>rough cloth cloak</rgb> at a <rgb=#FF00FF00>workbench</rgb>
Bring the <rgb=#FF00FF00>rough cloth cloak</rgb> to the Novice Tailor

'She said I'd be happy to take on a new tailoring apprentice? I think that's overselling it. I'll teach you the basics, but I have a whole town's worth of clothing to either fix, alter, or make from whole cloth, so I'm a little too busy to dedicate lots of time to you. I'll show you how to make a basic cloak, though.

'If you get confused by anything, talk to me again and I'll help.

'Oh, here, take this <rgb=#FF00FF00>crate</rgb>. Everything you need to make a rough cloth cloak is inside this <rgb=#FF00FF00>crate</rgb>.

'Open it up, make sure your <rgb=#FF00FF00>tailoring tools</rgb> are equipped, then make your way to the <rgb=#FF00FF00>workbench</rgb>.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>Tailor vendors sell ingredients and recipes that are a vital part of any Tailor's training and continued work.</rgb>
You have made a rough cloth cloak
'Good work, so far. Get your hands to work and stitch together that <rgb=#FF00FF00>rough cloth cloak</rgb>.'\n\n<rgb=#FF00FF00>To open your craï¿½
